<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get a redirect callback URL by PactualId"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/receiver/payment/consent/callback-url/{pactualId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This method is called to get a redirect callback URL by its PactualId.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"pactualId","description":"BTG's unique ID for the redirect callback URL.","schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
